short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Runs on https://servicedesk.steadfasttech.com.au/ and provide useful enhancements: Photo viewer, Sticky sidebar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhancements to Steadfasttech Servicedesk Support website:
- Provides useful enhancements for Steadfasttech's Developers and Support Team
- Photo viewer: Simply click on any photo in the Description or Comment to open Photo Viewer, powered by viewerjs
- Sticky sidebar: Make side bar stay static on the page. Helpful for tickets with long history and many comments.
